destinations.name: Paris
destinations.description: The city of Light, known for its art, architecture, and cuisine.

destinations.name: Bali
destinations.description: A tropical paradise with stunning beaches, temples, and rice terraces.

destinations.name: New York City
destinations.description: THe city that never sleeps - skyscrapers, Broadway and endless energy.

destinations.name: Tokyo
destinations.description: Largest city of Japan, a global hub for culture and technology.

destinations.name: Quebec
destinations.description: Known for its Lakes, and rivers like St.Lawrence River, it is also the oldest city of Canada with vibrant multicultural society.

destinations.name: Sydney
destinations.description: Famous for the Sydney Opera house and Sydney Harbour Bridge, as well as its many beaches.

destinations.name: Rome
destinations.description: A city of History, ancient ruins and mouthwatering Italian cuisine.

destinations.name: Maui
destinations.description: A Hawaiian Island perfect for scenic drives, waterfalls, and snorkeling.

destinations.name: Santorini
destinations.description: A beautiful Greek island with whitewashed buildings and blue-domed roofs.

destinations.name: Kyoto
destinations.description: A city in Japan known for its classical Buddhist temples, gardens, imperial palaces, and traditional wooden houses.

destinations.name: Venice
destinations.description: The city, also known as La Dominante, has suffered from regular floodings since it was founded. Currently, this phenomenon called Acqua Alta still occurs several times a year and is a serious problem for the city.

destinations.name: Cape Town
destinations.description: A port city on South Africa’s southwest coast, known for its harbor, Table Mountain, and beaches.

destinations.name: Reykjavik
destinations.description: Iceland’s capital, known for its colorful buildings, geothermal spas, and Northern Lights.

destinations.name: Cusco
destinations.description: A city in the Peruvian Andes, gateway to Machu Picchu and Incan history.

destinations.name: Barcelona
destinations.description: A vibrant city known for its art, architecture by Gaudí, and Mediterranean beaches.

destinations.name: Petra
destinations.description: An ancient city carved into red rock cliffs, known as the Rose City.

destinations.name: Banff
destinations.description: A mountain town in the Canadian Rockies with stunning lakes and alpine views.

destinations.name: Dubai
destinations.description: A futuristic city known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and desert adventures.

destinations.name: Amalfi Coast
destinations.description: A coastal region with cliffside villages, lemon groves, and azure waters.

destinations.name: Seoul
destinations.description: A dynamic city blending tradition with K-pop culture, street food, and cutting-edge tech.

destinations.name: Prague
destinations.description: A fairy-tale city known for its medieval architecture and charming Old Town.

destinations.name: Buenos Aires
destinations.description: Argentina’s capital, known for tango, vibrant neighborhoods, and steak.

destinations.name: Zanzibar
destinations.description: A tropical paradise with white sand beaches, turquoise waters, and spice tours.

destinations.name: Hallstatt
destinations.description: A picturesque lakeside village with Alpine houses and salt mines.

destinations.name: Istanbul
destinations.description: A city where East meets West, rich in history and culture.

destinations.name: Hạ Long Bay
destinations.description: Known for its emerald waters and thousands of towering limestone islands.

destinations.name: Galápagos Islands
destinations.description: An archipelago famed for unique wildlife and volcanic landscapes.

destinations.name: Vienna
destinations.description: Austria’s elegant capital known for imperial palaces, classical music, and coffeehouse culture.

destinations.name: Cappadocia
destinations.description: A surreal landscape of rock formations, cave dwellings, and hot air balloons.

destinations.name: Cinque Terre
destinations.description: A string of colorful seaside villages on the rugged Italian Riviera coastline.
